When was Amateur Athletics Federation of India established?
Who received the first Indian to receive Olympic medal after Independence
column10: Khashaba Dadasaheb Jadhav was an Indian athlete. He is best known as a wrestler who won a bronze medal at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsink.  The medal which was given to Jadhav was the first to be won by any Indian.
